text:
Alagappa University has announced the results of examinations, conducted by its affiliated colleges in November 2015, for all undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma programmes. The results have been posted on its website, www.alagappauniversity.

ac.in. Students may apply for revaluation of answer scripts in the format which could be downloaded from the website. Application for revaluation along with a demand draft for Rs. 500 per subject, drawn in favour of the Registrar, Alagappa University, payable at Karaikudi, should reach the Controller of Examinations on or before February 6, a release said.
title: Results published
